instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879-B PPBUS_g3h is  coming 12.6V then gradually going to 0.v in 20-30 seconds
threads.message:
Hi All,

This is not a liquid damaged macbook. how ever got moisture near C6990. Earlier no pp3v42_g3h . I replaced the caps and now i have steady 
PP3V42_g3h. But PPBUS_G3H is coming 12.6v then gradually going down.

I replaced ISL625 and Q7020,Q7035. no change.

Any clue?

threads.title: 820-2879-B PPBUS_g3h is  coming 12.6V then gradually going to 0.v in 20-30 seconds
threads.message:
Check if 3V3_S5 tries to appear.
L7030 voltage steady without F7040?

threads.title: 820-2879-B PPBUS_g3h is  coming 12.6V then gradually going to 0.v in 20-30 seconds
threads.message: Spot on. #v3_s5 was shorted. Replaced the shorted caps fan spinning. Thank you so much for your help.
